RESOURCE.STRING: This test exercises the VGT to assist in troubleshooting.

Initial Conditions 1. Engine Off Steps 1. Select Start Additional Information 1. If required, select Stop to end the test early 2. The test will not start if the ECM detects a condition that would prevent the test from running 3. If an error is encountered during the test, this can be due to an internal turbocharger error preventing the test from completing 4. If the test fails, this means the test has completed and determined that the VGT does not meet the required specifications
The test is not supported by the current calibration.
The ECM detects a condition in which the test can not be run.
The test has completed and passed.
The test has completed and failed.
A VGT error has occurred which is preventing the test from completing.

<ErrorInfo><ErrorNumber>43000</ErrorNumber><Description>INSITE can not read the ECM parameters when connected to the ECM. Please contact technical support.</Description><Suggestion>Check if the parameter(s) is supported in the calibration.</Suggestion></ErrorInfo>

<ErrorInfo><ErrorNumber>43000</ErrorNumber><Description>An internal error has occurred in the INSITE program. Please contact technical support.</Description><Suggestion>Check if the parameter(s) is supported in the calibration.</Suggestion></ErrorInfo>

<ErrorInfo><ErrorNumber>43000</ErrorNumber><Description>An internal error has occurred in the INSITE program. Please contact technical support.</Description><Suggestion>Check if the parameter(s) is supported in the calibration.</Suggestion></ErrorInfo>
